title: BREAKFAST BAR INCLUDED IN THIS ONE-BEDROOM APARTMENT
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Solis at Flamingo <URL>Address: 3275 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV 89121 Want more information?', '<URL> Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x888  Property Description This one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment from Solis at Flamingo has a well-designed interior with wood-style vinyl flooring and a spacious living room with oversized windows.', 'The layout has a separate dining area with an extra closet to store cookbooks, tablecloths, and other items.', 'Stylish details decorate the kitchen interior which has a glass tile backsplash and faux granite tops on the counters and breakfast bar.', 'In addition to this, the kitchen also comes with stainless steel GE appliances and upgrades of new hardware and lighting.', 'The construction of the bedroom includes a private bathroom and a large closet as well.', 'Residents will appreciate the community’s garden-style setting with a pet park, grilling stations, and resort-style pools.', 'The community has easy access to Interstate 515 and 593.', 'Call today for more information.', 'Apply Now To Receive Up To $500 OFF Your Move-In Costs On Select Apartment Homes | Contact Us For Details | Restrictions ApplyFloor Plan/Unit Features  * Washer & Dryer In Most Apartments  * Stainless Steel GE Appliances * Ceiling Fan * Carport  * Private Balcony * Private Patio  * Dishwasher * Refrigerator  * Range * Microwave  * Fireplace  * Air Conditioning Property Amenities  * Smoke-Free Community *', 'Pool * Spa  * Sundeck*', 'Clubhouse  * Business Center  * Pet Park * Basketball Court  * Green Globe Certified  * Fitness Center <font Lease Terms: 3 - 13 monthsOnline Leasing URL: <URL> Parking: Surface Lot Parking - Covered Lot Parking - Detached Garages Available', 'Fee', '- $100.00Type - Extra Storage Units Available - $75.00 Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'Max Weight: 40 (lb), Breed restrictions apply, please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Building Type:', 'Garden Style', 'Year Built:', '1989', 'Remodeled:', '2018', 'Units:', '524', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'ConAm Management', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x888', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
